ErrorIndex.title: Wrapper for index information inside an error.

ErrorResponse.description: Generic error response for REST APIs

code.description: the numeric HTTP error code for the response.

details.description: The optional details of the error response.

dictionary.description:
Dictionary/map of associated data/information relevant to the error.
The error "message" may contain {{name}} escapes that should be substituted
with information from this dictionary.

errors.description:
Collection of errors in cases where more than one exists. This needs to be
flexible so we can support multiple formats

internal.description: Internal error code in cases where we don't have an array of errors

message.description: The basic text error message for the error response.

ref.description: Reference to the error source. Should typically be the URI of the request

type.description:
URI pointing at a document that describes the error and mitigation steps
If there is no document, point to the RFC for the HTTP error code

x-eda-nokia-com.ui-pattern-error: A valid name is made up of one or more components where each component is separated by period characters.  Each component must start and end with a lower case alphanumeric character and the body of the component is made up of zero or more lower case alphanumeric and hyphen characters.

Status.title: Status is a return value for calls that don't return other objects.

com.nokia.eda.components.v1alpha1.Compon.description: Component is the Schema for the components API

spec.description: ComponentSpec defines the desired state of Component

node.description:
TopologyNode this Component resides on.
Indicates the operation in which to apply the configuration
node.title: Node

slot.description: Slot this Component resides in, unset for Components that do not have a slot or ID.
slot.title: Slot

spec.title: Specification

status.description: ComponentStatus defines the observed state of Component

enabled.description: The administrative status of this Component.
enabled.title: Enabled

lastChange.description: The date and time this Component last changed operational state
lastChange.title: Last Change

manufacturedDate.description: The date this Component was manufactured
manufacturedDate.title: Manufactured Date

operationalState.description: Indicates the current operational state of this Component.
operationalState.title: Operational State

partNumber.description: The discovered part number of this Component
partNumber.title: Part Number

serialNumber.description: The discovered serial number of this Component
serialNumber.title: Serial Number

type.description: Component type, as provided by the node.
type.title: Type

status.title: Status

com.nokia.eda.components.v1alpha1.Compon.description: ComponentList is a list of components

com.nokia.eda.components.v1alpha1.Discov.description: Discovery is the Schema for the discoveries API

spec.description: DiscoverySpec defines the desired state of Discovery

nodeSelector.description: Selector to use when selecting TopoNodes to discover components for.
nodeSelector.title: Node Selector

operatingSystem.description: Operating system to match against when selecting TopoNodes
operatingSystem.title: Operating System

spec.title: Specification

status.description: DiscoveryStatus defines the observed state of Discovery

nodes.description: List of TopoNodes component discovery is running for
nodes.title: Nodes

status.title: Status

com.nokia.eda.components.v1alpha1.Discov.description: DiscoveryList is a list of discoveries

get.description:
read the specified Component.  If a git hash query parameter
is supplied, the resource as it existed at the time of the git hash
will be returned. Streaming is not supported when a particular revision
is asked for.

parameters.description: the namespace scope from which to retrieve the result
parameters.name: namespace

parameters.description: name of the Component to retrieve
parameters.name: name

parameters.description: a label selector string to filter the results based on CR labels
parameters.name: label-selector

parameters.description: client information for streaming request
parameters.name: eventclient

parameters.description: stream information for streaming request
parameters.name: stream

parameters.description: resource content will be returned as it was at the time of this git hash
parameters.name: hash
